title: League decides to disappear before preseason
body:
Basically, I clicked on the LoL icon as usual, I clicked Launch as usual, but then all the league-related processes disappeared from my task manager. I said aight, let's reboot this thing, so I restarted my computer. Nothing. Uninstalled and re-installed, I had an error of OLEACC.dll, checked it up online, nothing would work, at least of what was being suggested. I said aight, lets re-install, and so I did. Rads error came up, http couldnt not connect to server..firewall..etc. I was like aight, lets check it up online, common error iirc. Tried most if not anything but nothing worked. I was so pissed off cause I had a tournament thingy and I had to pass cause of this, so I just starting opening LoL gently, and trying, maybe if I believed it really hard it would work. Five minutes into this, I dont get the http error, but league disappears again, this time without prompting me to click launch whatsoever, I barely click the icon , get the logo and then nothing. 
I would appreciate all sorts of help with much love,
Air Surfer.

replies.body: Ahhhhh sounds like your OS doesn't have the right permission settings in place for League to be able to read from the files it needs to. No worries, you should be able to fix this up pretty quickly with this handy [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
